DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_GP_OPOR_STATUS_1
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 CASE STATUS
 WHEN 1 THEN 'EM ELABORAÇÃO'
 WHEN 2 THEN 'NEGOCIAÇÃO'
 WHEN 6 THEN 'SUSPECT'
 WHEN 7 THEN 'PREVIA DE VALORES'
 WHEN 8 THEN 'PROPOSTA'
 WHEN 10 THEN 'FECHADO'
 END AS STATUS,
 SUM(VALORTOTAL) VALOR,
 CASE STATUS
 WHEN 1 THEN '#5C9BD1'
 WHEN 2 THEN '#F4D03F'
 WHEN 6 THEN '#9B59B6'
 WHEN 7 THEN '#BFBFBF'
 WHEN 8 THEN '#F3C200'
 WHEN 10 THEN '#26C281'
 END AS COR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE MONTH(DATAFECHAMENTO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(DATAFECHAMENTO) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND STATUS NOT IN (3,5,9,11)
GROUP BY STATUS
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="STATUS" From="A" Path="STATUS" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
